page.title: 03AN ORDINARY DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: The time is 9a.m.,Matthew and I say goodbye to mum,get our bikes out and cycle to school.We got there at 9:10a.m. I hang my bag and coat up in the cloakroom.The bell rings for school to start at 9:15a.m. Our teacher marks the register and a girl gives out some hymn books.We join the infants in their classroom for our service,it is the first and second year juniors' turn to take service.It is about our pets one girl brought her rabbit to show us. After service we have spelling and tables tests.We did hand writing practice and English work until playtime at 10:35a.m. I play rounders with my friends until the bell rings for the end of playtime at 10:55a.m. Back in our classroom we have a Maths lesson and our teacher reads us a story.
